author: scottbw
msg: For WOOKIE-26 - this fixes a problem whereby all files are served as "text/xml" including CSS, JS etc when using Jetty

author: scottbw
msg: This relates to WOOKIE-26 and adds the latest version of DWR (2.0.5) to ant/lib as the only version in the ivy repositories is an older one that won't work (2.0.3). I've also refactored the Ivy dependencies to use only "default" configurations where possible (and not pull in further jars for their own source builds etc).
